wikipedia_page.main: Steven James "Steve" Lampier (born 2 March 1984) is a British road racing cyclist, who currently rides for and manages UCI Continental team Saint Piran. He previously rode for Ribble Weldtite in 2020, JLT–Condor in 2016 and 2017, Team Raleigh in 2015 and Velosure–Giordana in 2013 and 2014.
